content:
President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky noted that rescue work is currently underway in the Dnieper. In particular, the college buildings, kindergartens are damaged. All services are in place.

He is about itsaidduring the evening appeal.

In addition, he thanked everyone who reacts, who goes to the place of blows to give people a help as soon as possible. This is the most important.

The head of state also noted that it is equally important that Russian terrorists receive answers to their blows. Each time more long answers.

“I thank each of our warriors, all Ukrainians and Ukrainians who provide it. The Russian system of war, anyone involved in this aggression - all of them should feel real that aggression will simply not go away, ”the President of Ukraine said.

Volodymyr Zelenskyy stressed that evil should lose. And will lose. Aircraft for Ukraine is a protection of life, it is what to work, the air defense systems that are in the world cannot simply be dust somewhere in the bases when they can save thousands of lives from Russian terror.

“I thank everyone who helps Ukraine! Thank you all who protect our life, our country, our independence! Thank you to our soldiers! Thank you to everyone who holds positions and destroys the occupier. We must win, ”the head of state added.

According to the Armyinform, the President of Ukraine stated that international efforts to hold Russia for military crimes in Ukraine are the line from which movement to a reliable peace can begin.
title: President of Ukraine: Russian terrorists receive long -range answers to their blows
